{{portal|Stargate|Stargate-color.png}}
 
'''''Stargate''''' is an American [[military science fiction]] film released through [[MetroâGoldwynâMayer]] (MGM) and [[Carolco]] in 1994. Created by [[Dean Devlin]] and [[Roland Emmerich]], the film is the first release in the [[Stargate|''Stargate'' franchise]]. Directed by Roland Emmerich, the film stars [[Kurt Russell]], [[James Spader]], [[Jaye Davidson]], [[John Diehl]], [[Rae Allen]] and [[Alexis Cruz]]. The plot centers around the premise of a "[[Stargate (device)|Stargate]]", a ring-shaped device that creates a [[wormhole]] enabling travel to a similar device a galaxy away.
'''''Stargate''''' is an American [[military science fiction]] film released through [[MetroâGoldwynâMayer]] (MGM) and [[Carolco]] in 1994. Created by [[Dean Devlin]] and [[Roland Emmerich]], the film is the first release in the [[Stargate|''Stargate'' franchise]]. Directed by Roland Emmerich, the film stars [[Kurt Russell]], [[James Spader]], [[Jaye Davidson]], [[John Diehl]], [[Rae Allen]] and [[Alexis Cruz]]. The plot centers around the premise of a "[[Stargate (device)|Stargate]]", a ring-shaped device that creates a [[wormhole]] enabling travel to a similar device a galaxy away.
